### Installation

```
> npm install anime-photos
```

### Example

```js
const Anime = require("anime-photos")

console.log(Anime.getRandomAnime())
```

### Discord.js Example 

```js
const Anime = require("anime-photos")

client.on("message", message => {
 if (message.content == "randomAnime") {
   message.channel.send(Anime.getRandomAnime())
 }
})
```
